name: James Smith
title: Supervisor
description: Company supervisors manage the workflow of their team or department by assigning tasks, supporting staff, monitoring results and reporting to senior management.

name: Robert Taylor
title: Founder & Director
description: Company directors oversee the strategic direction and performance of a company. They set the vision, mission and goals, and ensure compliance with legal and ethical standards.

name: Tanzid Hasan
title: Events Manager
description: Event managers plan and execute various types of events for their clients or employers. They handle the budget, logistics, marketing and evaluation of the events.

name: Kethy Taylor
title: Events Manager
description: Event managers plan and execute various types of events for their clients or employers. They handle the budget, logistics, marketing and evaluation of the events.
